[[Image:Mob Lights Add-On key art.webp|thumb|300px|Key art for the add-on.]]
'''Mob Lights''' is an add-on developed by ''HorizonBlocks'' as part of the [[Beyond the Pale Garden]] event, centered around light fixtures in the shape of [[Mob|mobs]].
